title: PHI Token Price Hits $0.21 on Top Exchanges (PHI)
content: PHI Token (CURRENCY:PHI) traded 6.1% higher against the U.S. dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. In the last week, PHI Token has traded down 21% against the U.S. dollar. PHI Token has a market cap of $1.06 million and $21,660.00 worth of PHI Token was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One PHI Token token can currently be purchased for $0.21 or 0.00002768 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges.    Here’s how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 3.8% against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded down 1.1% against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 9.5% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   PHI Token Profile    PHI Token’s total supply is 14,109,443 tokens and its circulating supply is 4,997,395 tokens. PHI Token’s official Twitter account is @PhiToken and its Facebook page is accessible here . PHI Token’s official website is www.phitoken.io .  Buying and Selling PHI Token    PHI Token can be purchased on these cryptocurrency exchanges: Livecoin. It is usually not possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as PHI Token directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire PHI Token should first purchase Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as GDAX, Gemini or Coinbase . Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to purchase PHI Token using one of the exchanges listed above.
